body: I think it'd be better to use `names.size() + num_classes` and allow calling that function multiple times (that will be useful for distributed tensors).
body_html: I think it'd be better to use names.size() + num_classes and allow calling that function multiple times (that will be useful for distributed tensors).
body_text: I think it'd be better to use names.size() + num_classes and allow calling that function multiple times (that will be useful for distributed tensors).
